attributes.action: Abolish the mandatory 0.7% GDP Foreign Aid target and spend our money at home
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Government to abolish the mandatory 0.7% GDP target and focus its priorities on defence, armed forces, homeless veterans and flood defences.
attributes.background:
We believe it is time our Government got its priorities right and abolished the mandatory Foreign Aid budget target.
When we have homeless veterans sleeping on our streets, flooding in our towns and villages, it is wrong to spend over £14bn a year on Foreign Aid
